items.title: Brushes
items.summary: What's in the Box? There are a bunch of (really really) cheap brushes in the box. They include 20 "rounds" size 1 (sizes vary across brands) and a bunch of "make up" brushes which are great for drybrushing (or make up - you do you).
items.content_html:
What's in the Box?

There are a bunch of (really really) cheap brushes in the box. They include 20 "rounds" size 1 (sizes vary across brands) and a bunch of "make up" brushes which are great for drybrushing (or make up - you do you).

Brushes are Consumables they wear out (and these rounds will wear out super fast). You will still be able to use them for different things (stippling, effects etc.) 

Get some brush soap and clean your brushes they will keep a point longer.

General Info about Brushes

What brushes do you need?

Best brush for mini painting and how to look after it

items.title: Kimera Kolors
items.summary: What's in the Box? A full set of Kimera Kolors paints in sample size pots. 13 pure pigment acrylics and 1 satin medium High pigment concentration, ranging from 30% to 50% Creamy consistence and matt finiture, but they can be made satin by adding in…
items.content_html:
What's in the Box?

A full set of Kimera Kolors paints in sample size pots.

13 pure pigment acrylics and 1 satin medium

High pigment concentration, ranging from 30% to 50%
Creamy consistence and matt finiture, but they can be made satin by adding in your mix the satin medium provided.
13 pigments are selected in a scientific way to be the best range to create every colors

PIGMENTS LIST:
PW6 – Titanium White (Titanium Dioxide)
PBK7 – Carbon Black or Lamp Black (Amorphous carbon from soot)
PV23 – Violet (Dioxazine Violet)
PG7 – Phtalo Green (Phthalocyanine green – blue shade)
PB15.4 – Phthalo blue green shade (Copper Phthalocyanine)
PB15.2 – Phthalo blue red shade (Copper Phthalocyanine)
PR122 – Quinacridone magenta (Quinacridone)
PR170 – Red (Naphthol AS Red)
PR101 (130) – Red Oxide (Red iron oxide)
PY42 – Yellow Oxide (Yellow iron oxide)
PO34 – Orange (Pyrazolone Orange)
PY83 – Warm yellow (Diarylide Yellow HR)
PY151 – Cold yellow (Benzimidazolone Yellow)

General Info about Kimera Kolors

Best colours for Miniature Painting

Kimera Kolors Product Review

items.title: Glazes
items.summary: What's in the Box? Liquitex Glazing Medium A glaze is a paint medium that is translucent, which when applied, will allow underlying color to show through. Additionally, a glaze will act as a “filter” that changes the color and value appearance of the surface. In other words,…
items.content_html:
What's in the Box?

Liquitex Glazing Medium

General Info on Glazing Mediums

A glaze is a paint medium that is translucent, which when applied, will allow underlying color to show through. Additionally, a glaze will act as a “filter” that changes the color and value appearance of the surface. In other words, glazes can change color saturation, hue, and tone.

Tutorial: Glazing

How to Glaze Miniatures

Videos

Glazing explained in 5 minutes

How to Glaze

https://youtu.be/A13JfFJxtIg

items.title: Mini-Painting Box
items.summary: This site is primarily for the owners of the posh handmade mini painting box gift set. The site contains links to resources relating to items in the box, or related mini painting topics.
